ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Least Powerful Class in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Sure the granularity could be refined, but you get the USA Today perception of bards, which may be the general perception of bards. :-P Reminds me when I
ygData.messageBody:
Sure the granularity could be refined, but you get the USA Today perception
of bards, which may be the general perception of bards. :-P

Reminds me when I visited Neutral Ground a while back and watched a group
hunting in Karnor's I think. This one cleric was just sitting and cussing
about a bard twisting with an instrument in his group just because she was
swinging away with hand to hand combat. He just felt that the bard was a
wasted slot anyway.

---Windleaf

At 04:58 PM 9/12/00 -0700, Jeffrey Sue wrote:

>that's a totally bogus poll anyway. in groups? solo? fighting blues?
>fighting reds? what level? what kind of equipment?
>
>you get a different answer depending on how you answer those
>questions.
>
>
> >Interesting perception about bard's on Allakhazam's poll:
> >
> >http://everquest.allakhazam.com/polls/everquest/poll.htm
> >
> >You can bypass voting if you want by just clicking on "View the Results". I
> >don't mean to start a grip session. As a bard I consider us quite powerful,
> >but then again, I'm level 38 and pretty much loving life as I'm able to do
> >all the things a bard can, without just getting the "sing manasong only"
> >too often.
> >
> >---Windleaf Mistsong
> >
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
